title: Add workflow rejoin/reset capability
description:
Enhance workflow system to handle rejoining workflows gracefully:

**Current Problem:**
- When a workflow is already registered, attempts to start a new workflow fail
- No way to rejoin a completed workflow at a specific step
- No way to reset workflow progress with new task description

**Requirements:**
1. Allow rejoining workflows at any specified step (even if complete)
2. Reset all subsequent steps to default/pending state when rejoining
3. Allow updating task description when rejoining
4. Maintain workflow history/audit trail of resets
5. Handle edge cases: invalid step names, dependencies between steps

**Proposed Solution:**
- Add `workflow_rejoin` MCP tool with parameters: worktreePath, step, taskDescription
- Add `workflow_reset` MCP tool to clear workflow and start fresh
- Modify `workflow_register` to accept `force` or `reset` flag
- Store rejoin events in workflow history with timestamps

**Files to Modify:**
- internal/workflow/manager.go - Add rejoin logic
- internal/workflow/state.go - Track rejoin history
- internal/mcp/server.go - Add new MCP tools
- cmd/bob/main.go - Wire up new commands

**Testing:**
- Test rejoining at each step of brainstorm workflow
- Test rejoining completed workflow
- Test invalid step names
- Test concurrent rejoins
- Test workflow history tracking
